original_text: I have seen another terrible thing that happens on the earth. Some people may store their riches, but it does not help them in a time of trouble. I have seen another terrible thing that happens on the earth. Some people may store their riches, but it does not help them in a time of trouble. I have seen another terrible thing that happens on the earth.
korean_text: 내가 해 아래에서 큰 폐단되는 일이 있는 것을 보았나니 곧 소유주가 재물을 자기에게 해가 되도록 소유하는 것이라

sentences.original_text: I have seen another terrible thing
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또 다른 무서운 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: Some people may store their riches
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 자신의 재물을 쌓아 둘 수 있다

sentences.original_text: but it does not help them
